name: Linky
description:
A link shortener built for designers right on Figma.


  • Unlimited short links.
  • Custom or random alphanumeric short links.
  • Edit any shortened link.
  • Track link views.
  • All for free. More Pro features coming soon.


Agencies, consultants and freelancers

Stop sending huge chunks of urls to your clients that look unprofessional, mask your links with a clean and short link.


Product teams

Stop updating your design links in your task management system every time you move things around, shorten your links and update them at any time with Linky so your design are always available, even when you make big changes like removing frames or moving them to a different document.


Configure Linky by providing your file share url, once pasted, Linky will show all the different link options for your file. The url is saved in your Figma file.
